name: CICD - docker lab 1
description: A short lab in order to create a test/dev environement for a simple python web app (python + postgresql / adminer).

task_list.name: Create python app
task_list.description: Create really simple python web app working with postgresql database

task_list.name: Create the container for python app
task_list.description: Create the container for python app

task_list.name: Get everything into docker compose
task_list.description: wrap up everything into docker compose, following : https://www.docker.com/blog/how-to-use-the-postgres-docker-official-image/
